DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess safety and tolerability of AZD1656 after single ascending oral doses in healthy male subjects
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Safety and Tolerability After Oral Dosing of AZD1656 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Provision of informed consent Clinically normal physical findings and laboratory values as judged by the investigator including negative test of Hepatitis B surface antigen, antibodies to HIV virus and antibodies to hepatitis C virus. Clinically significant illness or clinically relevant trauma, as judged by the investigator, within 2 weeks before the first administration of the Investigational Product History of psychiatric or somatic disease/condition that may interfere with the objectives of the study, as judged by the investigator
